snippet: The loss of Beledweyne, a trading hub near the Ethiopian border, leaves Shabab rebels on the defensive.
abstract: Ethiopian troops seize strategic Somali town Beledweyne from militant group Shabab, leaving militants spread thin and on the defensive.

byline.original: By MOHAMMED IBRAHIM and JEFFREY GETTLEMAN
byline.contributor: Mohammed Ibrahim reported from Mogadishu, and Jeffrey Gettleman from Nairobi, Kenya.

lead_paragraph: The loss of Beledweyne, a trading hub near the Ethiopian border, leaves Shabab rebels on the defensive.

headline.seo: Ethiopian Forces Seize Strategic Somali Town From the Shabab
headline.main: Strategic Somali Town Is Seized by Ethiopians
headline.print_headline: Strategic Somali Town Is Seized by Ethiopians
